title: Satellite Imagery - EOAnalysis
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic EOAnalysis made for the Satellite Imagerry domain. This entity is primarily associated with the process of analysis of Earth Observation applications.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It must be equal to EOAnalysis.

analyzedAt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Time'. The time at which the analysis finished

provider.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The provider of the algorithm

resultDescription.description: Property. The description of the analysis outcome.

analysisType.description: Property. Entity's type of analysis applied.

isAnalysisOf.description: Relationship. The ID of the product that was used in the analysis
